projectGridLines.title: Project 1 Title:Digital Marketing Strategy for Textile Products
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1 Title:Digital Marketing Strategy for Textile Products

Description: Develop and implement a comprehensive digital marketing strategy to

enhance the online presence of the company's textile products. This will include

optimizing the company's website, managing social media profiles, creating

engaging content, and running digital advertising campaigns.

Skill sets: Digital marketing, content creation, social media management, SEO,

Google Ads, data analytics.

Traits expectation:

Expected learning: Students will learn about digital marketing techniques, the

importance of an online presence for businesses, and how to measure and analyze

the effectiveness of digital campaigns.

Specific courses required for project execution: ANY

Project 2 Title:Full Stack App development on React Native, Website Development on

Wordpress

Description: Managing the database to display the products and to create a

backend network to send apis and create a fully functional clothing market app.

Skill sets:Strong knowledge in React and NodeJS, Adaptivity to deal with new

frameworks

Traits expectation: strong coding skills especially debugging and designing skill

Expected learning:Students will learn about how to deploy an app and its

functioning about how to switch between frameworks and connect and create

database relations to get APIâ€™s and display then on a frontend framework
